about.excerpt: Civil Engineer & BIM technologist integrating field experience with web tools and automation.
paragraphs: I'm a Civil Engineer, BIM Technologist, and web-focused problem solver exploring how digital tools, automation, and smart workflows can transform the way we design, coordinate, and execute projects.
I enjoy working with BIM tools (Revit, ACC, CAD) and exploring web development & automation—building utilities like BIM-related scripts that reduce repetitive work.
I'm focused on becoming a future-ready engineer who can combine civil engineering fundamentals with digital tools, automation, and efficient workflows.
